message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this valuable product. I believe it's a great fit for you, and I'm confident you'll find it worth the investment. My initial offer is $1200000. I'm open to negotiations, but I'm looking for a serious buyer who can appreciate the value of this product.

I appreciate your initial offer, Alice, but I'm looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $1100000 for the product. I believe this price is still a fair reflection of the product's value, and I'm hoping we can come to an agreement.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand you're looking to save some money, but I'm not willing to go as low as $1100000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering at $1150000. I believe this price still represents a great value for the product, and I'm confident you'll find it worth the investment.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice. However, I'm still looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $1120000 for the product. I believe this price is still a good compromise, and I'm hoping we can come to an agreement.

I understand you're trying to save some more money, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $1120000. I'm willing to make another compromise, but I need to ensure I'm getting a fair price for the product. I'm counteroffering at $1180000. This is my final offer, and I'm confident it's a great value for you.

I understand this is your final offer, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to pay $1150000 for the product. I'm trying to find a middle ground, and I hope we can meet in the middle.
